data.name: Flight Attendant Simulator
data.detailed_description:
MORE FROM DEPARTURE INTERACTIVE

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1153210
https://store.steampowered.com/app/882250


About the Game

TAKE FLIGHT

Travel the world as you progress through your career unlocking exotic destinations, unique aircraft, and a choice of career opportunities with a variety of airline carriers.


STAY SAFE

Keep your passengers safe and comfortable by performing in-flight service and handling dangerous emergency scenarios including severe turbulence, cabin decompressions, and fires.


CHECK-IN

Explore unique hotels on your layovers where you will be welcomed with a level of accommodation that is determined by your career performance.

data.short_description: Travel the world as you progress through your career as a flight attendant while ensuring the safety and comfort of your passengers.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti 3GB / R9 270X 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
